scripts.prisma:deploy: doppler run --config dev -- pnpm run prisma:deploy:raw
scripts.prisma:deploy:prod: doppler run --config prd -- pnpm run prisma:deploy:raw
scripts.prisma:deploy:qa: doppler run --config stg -- pnpm run prisma:deploy:raw
scripts.prisma:diff: doppler run --config dev --command 'prisma migrate diff --from-url "$PROD_DATABASE_URL" --to-migrations src/prisma/migrations --shadow-database-url "postgres://klicker:klicker@localhost:5432/shadow"'
scripts.prisma:migrate: doppler run --config dev -- prisma migrate dev --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:create: doppler run --config dev -- prisma migrate dev --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma --create-only
scripts.prisma:push: doppler run --config dev -- pnpm run prisma:push:raw
scripts.prisma:push:qa: doppler run --config stg -- pnpm run prisma:push:raw
scripts.prisma:reset: doppler run --config dev -- pnpm run prisma:reset:raw
scripts.prisma:reset:yes: doppler run --config dev -- pnpm run prisma:reset:raw -f
scripts.prisma:reset:qa: doppler run --config stg -- pnpm run prisma:reset:raw
scripts.prisma:reset:seed: doppler run --config dev -- prisma migrate reset --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:resolve:prod: doppler run --config prd -- prisma migrate resolve --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:studio: doppler run --config dev -- pnpm run prisma:studio:raw
scripts.prisma:studio:prod: doppler run --config prd -- pnpm run prisma:studio:raw
scripts.prisma:studio:qa: doppler run --config stg -- pnpm run prisma:studio:raw
scripts.script: ENV=development doppler run --config dev -- bun run
scripts.script:prod: ENV=production doppler run --config prd -- bun run
scripts.seed: ENV=development doppler run --config dev -- run-s build seed:test
scripts.seed:achievements: ENV=development doppler run --config dev bun run src/data/seedAchievements.ts
scripts.seed:groupActivityResults: ENV=development doppler run --config dev -- bun run src/data/seedGroupActivityResults.ts
scripts.seed:prod:achievements: ENV=production doppler run --config prd -- bun run src/data/seedAchievements.ts
scripts.seed:flashcards: ENV=development doppler run --config dev bun run src/data/seedFlashcards.ts
scripts.seed:prod:groupActivityResults: ENV=development doppler run --config prd bun run src/data/seedGroupActivityResults.ts
scripts.seed:prod:flashcards: ENV=development doppler run --config prd -- bun run src/data/seedFlashcards.ts
scripts.seed:prod:repetitionPool: ENV=development doppler run --config prd -- bun run src/data/seedRepetitionPool.ts
scripts.seed:qa: ENV=development doppler run --config stg -- bun run src/data/seedTEST.ts
